text: We had a pretty nice sampling of the (slightly confusing) between the three of us and everything was really good.

Chinese cafe, the ambiance is very relaxing. Loved the music. The food is very good: the Chinese hamburger is very tasty and excellent as a snack. The chicken and rice was a very filling meal my boyfriend loved it. The papaya milkshake was tasty good with a little whipped cream on top. The prices are fair and the owners seems very nice and attentive. Will go back for sure!

Dissimulé sous l'ancienne affiche "les gâteries monk" ce trouve le petit resto aux soupes délicieuses. J'y suis allé 3 fois et y retournerai encore.   Le menu est compliqué à déchiffrer alors soyez patient.

Café-resto à découvrir absolument !! Repas delicieux et decor aux allures de café relax et WIFI disponible !! Ça vaut la peine d'essayer tout leur menu !!!. J'ai adopté l'endroit.  On ecoute des ballades asiatiques sur place ;)
